name: CUBER (ATG STUDIO)
description:
Cuber is Developed by ATG Studios, which is Platformer Based Shooting Game.

Fight Till your Last Breathe.

Be the one to Survive from the Enemies and their Deadly Guns.

Go Shoot... Shoot... Shoot...

You Support me Through Patreon :-https://www.patreon.com/atg360
Follow me on Instagram :- https://www.instagram.com/atg.studios/
Follow me on Twitter :- https://twitter.com/GamesAbhi
Subscribe The Channel For More :- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCakLBK8ClT89plKRQNrps1A

Drag the Left Joystick for Movement,
Drag the Right Joystick for Shooting

Can Only Played In Android

Developed in India

Develop By an Indian
